mapper.insert: insert into tt_group_user (GROUP_ID, OPEN_ID, NICKNAME, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_ON, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_ON) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tt_group_user set NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_ON = now() where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OPEN_ID = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GROUP_ID, OPEN_ID, NICKNAME, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_ON, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_ON from tt_group_user
